EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_WWDCDinner_Q214.Invite (Michael Kahn)
EmailTemplate.subject: WWDC Dinner with Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
WWDC 2014 is upon us so we thought about getting together some of the best mobile experts in the business together for a night of drinks, awesome food and great people.
Please join us for dinner at Absinthe in Hayes Valley on Monday, June 2, 2014 at 6:30 p.m. Reply to this email to RSVP. This is an invite only dinner.
If you canâ€™t make it, please feel free to recommend someone else who could attend in your place. Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Monday, June 2, 2014 Time: 6:30 p.m. PDT Location: Absinthe SF, 398 Hayes St, San Francisco, CA 94102
Regards, Michael
Michael Kahn Director, Business Development Pivotal Labs 650.422.1198
